overview:
We hope to improve the travel experience by facilitating encounters on flights. As you get ready to travel for the holidays, be sure to post your flight up ahead of time so you can meet your buddies before checking in!

Mile High Buddies is for everyone! Whether you are interested in an airplane tryst, enjoying conversation, or searching for peaceful flying company, sign up to see who you can find.

Mile High Buddies is designed so that when you travel, you donâ€™t get stuck next to guy that snores, the baby the cries for 6 hours straight, the grandma who thinks youâ€™d be great for her grandson, or simply the person takes up your seat along with theirs.

Ever wonder, â€œ Why canâ€™t I sit next to him/her?â€ Well, here is your chance to make it happen.

Time to put yourself the cockpit and make sure that you are next to someone you can actually tolerate for next few hours.
